DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot randomize wait-list control trial test efficacy online cognitive behavioral pain management website call Proactive Self-Management Program Effects Cancer Treatment ( PROPSECT ) reduce bad pain intensity individual chronic painful chemotherapy-induced peripheral neuropathy ( CIPN ) explore mediate effect PROSPECT-induced change anxiety , fatigue , depression , sleep disturbance bad pain intensity . Another aim study determine whether PROSPECT decrease CIPN symptom severity ( e.g . non-painful numbness tingling ) , average pain severity , physical impairment . Lastly , since intervention never test individual painful CIPN , investigator assess patient ' perception acceptability satisfaction intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Self-Guided Online Cognitive Behavioral Strategies Chemotherapy-Induced Peripheral Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: 1. 25 year age 2. selfreport 4/10 bad CIPN pain ( Dworkin et al. , 2011 ) persist three month long cessation neurotoxic chemotherapy regimen 3. least grade one sensory CIPN define oncology provider use National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events ( NCICTCAE ) ( National Cancer Institute , 2010 ) 4. stable analgesic medication regimen evidence less 10 % increase decrease analgesic medication dosage two week lead enrollment study 5. internet access 6. selfreport ability use computer 7. sign inform consent 8. willingness participate study activity . 1. prognosis less three month 2. documented peripheral neuropathy due cause ( diabetes , alcohol abuse , CNS malignancy , vitamin B deficiency , hereditary , nerve compression injury ) 3. neurotoxic chemotherapy treatment regimen plan occur enrol study 4. participate cognitive behavioral pain management past plan enroll cognitive behavioral pain management course intervention .
